title: Extend seeded home catalog with additional products

requirements.summary: Add Jacket, Half Pant, Full Pant, and Football T-Shirt to the seeded product catalog so they appear on the home grid, open in product details, and can be added to cart like existing items.
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/src/data/products.ts` includes new `Product` entries for: "Jacket", "Half Pant", "Full Pant", and "Football T-Shirt" with unique `id` values, `price` values, English `description` text, and a non-empty `images` array for each.
The home page product list displays the newly added products alongside the existing seeded products without layout issues.
Each newly added product can be opened in the product details view and shows its name, price, description, and images.
Each newly added product can be added to the cart from both the product list and product details views, and the header cart count updates accordingly.

file_operations.description: Extend the exported seeded `products` array by adding 4 new `Product` entries named "Jacket", "Half Pant", "Full Pant", and "Football T-Shirt" with unique string `id`s (not colliding with existing ids), reasonable `price` numbers, English `description` text, and non-empty `images` arrays (use the existing placeholder asset path already used by other products).
